title: Unbalancer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Roleblock a player and grant another roleblock immunity.
- Heal a player and reduce another's defense. Unusable until N4.
- Attack a player and increase another's defense. Unusable until N4.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On Night 3, you will join the faction which has the least percentage of dead players, you selfish piece of shit. Neutrals are not included in this.
- If you join an REF, you're basically a true member and can do anything a normal member could.
- If nobody is dead, your ability is delayed until someone dies.
- You may multitask.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until you get a new goal, then complete that one.
